sentences.english: With the coming of national day, I have a one week holiday.
sentences.chinese: 星期天，爸爸妈妈和我去牡丹园游玩。

sentences.english: Both my parents are dead and I rarely see my two sisters.
sentences.chinese: 我的爸妈都死了，我很少见到我的两个妹妹。

sentences.english: Ater a semester, I yearn to see may parents.
sentences.chinese: 经过一个学期，我渴望见到我爸妈。

sentences.english: Now, Honey, they's my parents too.
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的，现在，他们也算我爸妈。

sentences.english: She always wants more of this, and her father and mother always stop too soon.
sentences.chinese: 她喜欢这么玩，但爸爸妈妈总是玩一下就停下来了。

sentences.english: Lee said he was most obedient to his parents, then, he was a hollow laugh.
sentences.chinese: 李说他最听爸妈的话，任干笑了。

sentences.english: If I don't get into university, my parents are gonna kill me.
sentences.chinese: 如果我考不上大学，我爸妈会宰掉我。

sentences.english: In the beginning, the bride's parents opposed her mariage, but at end, we agreed to.
sentences.chinese: 最初新娘子的爸妈反对这桩婚事，但最终还得同意了。

sentences.english: I'm go to visit my grorpare notnts the weekend?
sentences.chinese: 这个周末我打算去看望我的外祖爸妈。

sentences.english: Well, um, sometimes that happens with mommies and daddies.
sentences.chinese: 有时爸爸妈妈之间会就是这样的。

sentences.english: Shouldn't I introduce you to my parents as a friend?
sentences.chinese: 我不该把你当作一个朋友介绍给我爸妈么？

sentences.english: Father and Mother are out and Margot has gone to play Ping-Pong with some other young people.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸妈妈出去了，玛格特也和她的朋友打乒乓球去了。

sentences.english: What do mommies and daddies say to their 7-year-old child?” he asked.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸妈妈能给7岁大的孩子说什么呢？

sentences.english: They may also think it is a fun game to play with mommy and daddy.
sentences.chinese: 也可能他们认为是跟爸爸妈妈玩一个有趣的游戏。

sentences.english: "After we got married, we just spent his parents' money," she complains.
sentences.chinese: “我们结婚以后就是花他爸妈的钱”，她抱怨道。

sentences.english: My parents said, we went to the Shanghe.
sentences.chinese: 我对爸妈说，我们去赏荷吧。

definition: (informal) grandma (paternal grandmother)/(respectful) mistress of the house/CL:位[wei4]/(coll.) boobies/breasts
